name: Bok Bok Popovers
author: KCSTARK
summary: Serve these savory pastry squares with a nice tossed salad and tea for the perfect afternoon get together!
ingredients: 6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cooked
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl combine the cream cheese, chicken, sesame seeds, parsley and onion
DO NOT divide them into triangles as you usually would! Keep every 2 triangles together, forming 4 squares
Pinch the 'seam' in the middle of each square closed and pat each one out into a larger square
Put a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the center of each square
Fold the corners up into the center, layering like flower petals so that the roll is kind of sealed
Place popovers on a lightly greased cookie sheet and bake in the preheated oven until golden brown
